front.title: NETLMM Protocol Applicability Analysis for 3GPP SAE Network

abstract.t: The protocol of NETLMM Design Team output, defined in draft-giaretta- netlmm-dt-protocol-02.txt assumes non-NETLMM triggers, provided by so-called MN_Access_Network API, to initiate NETLMM procedures such as sending location registration to LMA. In this document, the NETLMM application to a mobility scenario of the 3GPP network, so-called SAE (system architecture evolution), is analyzed.
